file_content.text: Well. That was exciting, huh? With the guns and the nobles and the crazy gangsters?
I guess that's one way of looking at it.
You could say that.
Good to keep a positive attitude, right?
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
You'll find someone softer next time, right?
The next one better be easier.
Gonna do my best.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
These plans of yours never work out. I'm done.
I'm through with your schemes.
Ah, come on. So there were a few hiccups. We got what we went after, didn't we?
Can't believe that dumb kid is still breathing. We'll never build a good rep if you keep going easy.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
Wish we'd offed that stupid kid, but at least we got some extra credits for our trouble.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
At least that stupid kid got what he deserved. Made the whole situation a little less irritating.
Believe it or not, the Albreks looked like the easiest marks from Magaran's customer list. I'll make sure we've got a solid angle on the next run.
Whatever you get lined up--I'm in.
Sounds good.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
No more madness like this last one.
You'd better.
You can't tell me you didn't have a little bit of fun.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
I'm done, Vik! No more marks!
I said I'm out!
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
There won't be a next run. I'm through.
I'm not interested.
You say that now. See how you feel when the big payout is right under your nose.
This rundown was rough, but it was nothing compared to our usual work--and it paid a lot better.
We've got a good thing going here. Let's keep rolling with it.
We just walk in, show the files, act tough and walk out a good bit richer.
If Albrek is a noble, he must have guards.
I doubt it will be so easy.
Nope. The Albreks are at the bottom of the ladder--they don't even have servants. Forget about guards.
Can't wait.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
We'll head out as soon as we can.
Sounds good.
Is this guy going to be armed to the teeth?
How many guns did he buy?
It's going to be the easiest credits you ever made. You sure you're not interested?
I like you, Vik, but I can't do this.
I'm sorry, but I can't do it.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
I meant what I said, Vik. I'm out.
Not a chance.
Then we've got nothing to talk about.
I've changed my mind. Let's do this.
I want in after all.
Good thinking. Let's head for Alderaan and make some credits.
I'll let you know when everything's lined up. Then we'll pay the noble Lord Albrek a visit.
Hey. A pal of mine says he has a line on an easy score.
Guy's name is Trobec. He's the one who paid triple to take those Balmorran weapons off our hands.
His name's Trobec. I've worked with him before--he's no fool.
So, in or out?
I can always use spending money.
I'm in.
That's the spirit.
We're going after an Imp weapons transport. She's flying a back route with minimal escort. All we do is smash, grab and run.
What exactly would I be agreeing to?
Give me the details, first.
Knocking over an Imp weapons transport. What we'd normally do, but we get a lot more for it.
We'll get specifics from Trobec on Nar Shaddaa. Sound good?
Let's go make some credits.
Sounds good.
You've got a lot of enemies on Nar Shaddaa.
Is Nar Shaddaa safe?
Only enemy I have left on Nar Shaddaa is Magaran, and he's not nearly scary enough to keep me from going after this job.
We'll be fine, boss. Trust me.
Are you sure this isn't a setup?
Sounds dangerous.
Sure as I've ever been, so keep that blaster handy.
I'll pass, Vik.
No thanks.
Come on. It's an Imp weapons transport--nothing we wouldn't do anyway.
If you come around, Trobec will meet us on Nar Shaddaa with the details.
I'm surprised Magaran would hire people to come after us, but not his debtors.
He didn't send bounty hunters?
He only wanted us dead, and hired killers come cheap these days. Good debt collectors are expensive--you actually have to trust them.
There are credits to be made. People owe Magaran. We took him down--his stuff is our stuff.
Everyone who owed him owes us, now. I look through the lists, find the big debts, and we collect. Easy.
Get me names and coordinates, and we'll move out.
Make it happen.
Do you really think people would pay us?
Will it work?
Hey, come here--this is going to be hilarious. I'm calling the first guy I had lined up to buy those weapons from Balmorra.
He's upset that the deal didn't go through--I thought maybe you could explain it all to him.
Hey, hey, come here--this will be fun. I'm calling up the buyer I had lined up for those weapons from Balmorra.
He's upset that the deal didn't go through--I thought maybe we could clear things up for him.
Does it really matter if he gets an explanation?
Why bother?
Probably not. But I'll enjoy seeing the look on his face.
I'll be glad to clear everything up.
Fine.
I'm sure we can come to an alternate arrangement.
We can work this out.
Okay, alternate arrangement--instead of not bringing me the guns, you bring me the guns!
My new boss here--the commander of Havoc Squad--changed the plans. No guns, Red.
Got something for you, boss.
A friend of mine was very excited about the find we snagged on Balmorra. Paid so well I dumped my original buyer flat out. That's your cut.
I'm glad things worked out so well.
Good deal.
You and me both.
I'm the CO. I should get the biggest cut.
I deserve more.
A negotiator, huh? All right, I'll bite--but you'd better keep us both covered if anyone asks questions.
I don't want to be a part of this, Vik.
I changed my mind.
You're kidding, right? The deal's done--won't make any difference to back out now. Just take your cut and put it behind you.
I guess I might as well.
Fine, you're right.
There you go.
I can always use the credits for something worthwhile.
I'll put it to good use.
Or you could spend it on fancy booze and top-notch weaponry. Just sayin'.
If I get any more bright ideas for some extra income, I'll be sure to fill you in.
I'm not interested.
I said "no."
Suit yourself. More for me.
Maybe I'll just leave you out, next time.
We really should've grabbed those guns from Balmorra.
Old friend of mine just called, offered triple what my original buyer was offering. We could've done really well for ourselves.
They weren't our weapons to sell, Vik.
It would've been robbery.
You're right. How could I have lived with myself?
I'm sure you'll find more ways to make a quick profit.
You'll get over it.
Let's hope so.
Galaxy is full of opportunities, boss. Smart people take advantage when they see 'em, and the rest get left behind.
I might be interested in other opportunities.
Maybe next time.
Oh yeah? Maybe I'll keep you in the loop, then.
Let's get back to work.
I've had it with you.
You're never going to stop wasting your time trying to be the "perfect officer." You're useless to me.
I have a duty to be the best I can be, Vik. We all do.
I'm just doing my job.
Don't try to feed me that junk. We're here because we like to mess people up, and the army pays.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
Please, Vik--don't give up on me.
Give me another chance!
You're pathetic.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
I'm the CO, Vik. You serve me, not the other way around.
I'm in charge, not you.
That's not how I operate. I'm not a slave--I help you if you help me.
I'm not going anywhere--this is still a free meal ticket, so if something needs to blow up, I'll take care of it.
But don't expect more.
What is your problem, exactly?
You don't listen to my advice, you don't grab chances to make extra credits, and you never give me any slack. I'm sick of it.
Our ops don't leave room to mess around.
We have to stay disciplined.
That's what I mean. We've got plenty of room to make credits and finish our ops--you just won't see it.
Try doing things my way. You won't regret it.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
You're right, Vik. I'll listen to you more.
I shouldn't be so hard on you.
Maybe you'll see what you've been missing.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
You're here to fight, not to have a good time.
Get over it.
Yeah. I'm getting that.
You're really getting on my nerves, you know that?
You think you're better than me. You want to play "perfect soldier," fine--but I won't play along.
This isn't a game, Vik. We have to stay serious to get the job done.
Nobody's playing.
Heh. That's what you call it? Staying serious?
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
I never intended to insult you, Vik.
I'm sorry.
I really don't care what you intended. Just knock it off.
BROKEN LINK FROM VO MOVE - SEE Misc Text
I'm in charge here, Vik--you don't talk to me like that.
Lose the attitude!
Yeah. That's exactly what I'm talking about.
You want me to get your back, you'd better wise up. Sir.
